FAQ
Do you operate in daylight?
No. Operations conclude at first birdsong.
Can I bring a companion?
Yes, under Director and Consortium fares.
Is checked luggage available?
Yes, two soft cases. Hard shells by prior stamp only.
How early should I arrive?
17 minutes before moonrise or 22 minutes before departure, whichever arrives first.
